Key Match Events: Justin Steele held the Phillies to two runs in four innings Tuesday in the Cubs' 10-4 victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs' Justin Steele pitches during the second inning against the Phillies Tuesday in Philadelphia.
Others: David Ross complimented Steele for his ability to simplify his thoughts on the mound
Craig Counsell describes him as a 'clear-head competitor'
